Tomato_leaf_00006.jpg.text: The leaf is green with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and is slightly wavy. The edges are smooth, and there are no visible damages or spots on the leaf. The petiole is thin and green.

Tomato_leaf_00007.jpg.text: The leaf is predominantly green with a slightly veined texture. It has a somewhat oval shape with serrated edges. There are no visible damages, and the petiole appears to be thin and green.

Tomato_leaf_00003.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a serrated edge and a few small spots or discolorations on its surface. The leaf has a heart-shaped base and is attached to a petiole that appears to be of a similar green color to the leaf.

Tomato_leaf_00005.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and a slightly serrated edge. The leaf has a few small spots or discolorations, primarily on the upper side. The veins are visible, running from the base to the tip of the leaf. The petiole appears to be thin and green.

Tomato_leaf_00008.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and a serrated edge. There are no visible damages on the leaf, and it has a prominent vein running from the base to the tip.

Tomato_leaf_00004.jpg.text: The plant leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and a slightly wavy edge. There are no visible damages on the leaf, and it has a prominent vein running from the base to the tip.
